title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 3289/88 of 24 October 1988 amending Regulation (EEC) No 4136/87 determining the conditions of entry of horses intended for slaughter under CN-code 0101 19 10
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 3289/88
of 24 October 1988
amending Regulation (EEC) No 4136/87 determining the conditions of entry of horses intended for slaughter under CN-code 0101 19 10
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In paragraph 2 of Article 4 of Regulation (EEC) No 4136/87, '18' is replaced by '30'.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the eighth day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 24 October 1988.
For the Commission
COCKFIELD
Vice-President
(1) OJ No L 256, 7. 9. 1987, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 134, 31. 5. 1988, p. 1.
(3) OJ No L 387, 31. 12. 1987, p. 60.
